description: Bayesian evidence analysis agent for systems biology.
name: Dizzy-Beats

metadata.abstract: Â© The Author 2015. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.Motivation: Model selection and parameter inference are complex problems of long-standing interest in systems biology. Selecting between competing models arises commonly as underlying biochemical mechanisms are often not fully known, hence alternative models must be considered. Parameter inference yields important information on the extent to which the data and the model constrain parameter values. Results: We report Dizzy-Beats, a graphical Java Bayesian evidence analysis agent implementing nested sampling - an algorithm yielding an estimate of the log of the Bayesian evidence Z and the moments of model parameters, thus addressing two outstanding challenges in systems modelling. A likelihood function based on the L1-norm is adopted as it is generically applicable to replicated time series data. Availability and implementation: http://sourceforge.net/p/bayesevidence/home/Home/.
metadata.title: Dizzy-Beats: A Bayesian evidence analysis agent for systems biology
